alert.note: Alert for Acadia; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:23AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cameron, southeastern Jefferson Davis, southwestern Acadia and northwestern Vermilion Parishes through 900 AM CDT... At 823 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gueydan, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Mermentau, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Klondike, Morse, Riceville, Wright, Egan, Thornwell, Lowry, Estherwood, Florence Landing and Midland. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 71 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion
